## Summarise FST data
Boxplot by chromosome

```{r}
# EXAMPLE how boxplot works
# data("airquality")
# 
# boxplot(Temp~Month,
# data=airquality,
# main="Different boxplots for each month",
# xlab="Month Number",
# ylab="Degree Fahrenheit",
# col="orange",
# border="brown"
# )

```

```{r}
fst_data <- read.csv("./data_sheets/FST_SNPindex.csv")
```

```{r}
boxplot(FST~Chrom,
        data = fst_data,
        main="Summary of FST distribution per chromosome",
        xlab = "Chromosome",
        ylab = "FST",
        col="burlywood",
        border="darkslategrey")
```
